column4: Hello. I'm trying to install ubuntu on my desktop and upon loading the live CD I'm getting an error of "Frequency Over Ragne". So I went to the CLI and changed the HorizSync and VertRefresh. But as I did startx again, I'm now getting this error: AIGLX: Screen 0 is not DRI capable. Can anyone help?
that'st not really an error just make it so dri doesn't load in your xorg.conf
I'm not seeing any "load dri" on my xorg.conf
I'm not seeing any "load dri" on my xorg.conf how do I disable it?
